Dear DV community, after upgrading to Dataverse version 5.14, our PrePublish workflow does not work as expected any more (as it did with version 5.12.1). If a PrePublish workflow is activated, the dataset page is not refreshed after clicking the publish button. This happens both when we do an http request to an external API in the workflow as well as when we just have two log steps in the workflow configuration without any pause or http request. The workflow runs and finishes fine, just the dataset page is not refreshed, and for the user it seems that nothing happens. Only after a manual refresh of the dataset page, the dataset page is presented as expected. This behaviour is also reported in an old issue 7716. Does anyone else have the same issue or has an idea? See attached file for the workflow configuration. Thanks and best, Doro
workflow.json
Thanks for the bug report, @Dorothea Iglezakis. #7716 is quite old, I agree. Would you be willing to create a fresh issue? (Then, I'll close the old issue in favor of the new one.)
